text: Making Auntie Welcome is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Vincente DePascale - Jack * Virginia Capen - Grace * Oliver Hardy - Grocery Boy (as Babe Hardy) * Raymond McKee - Police Chief * Eva Bell - Auntie ==See also== * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Comedy short films
title: Making Auntie Welcome
